descript.abstract: An historical monthly precipitation dataset for global land areas from 1900 to 1996, gridded at two different resolutions (2.5 degrees latitude by 3.75 degrees longitude and 5 degrees latitude/longitude).

cntperp.cntorg: The Oak Ridge National Laboratory (ORNL) Distributed Active Archive Center (DAAC)

distinfo.resdesc: Hulme, M. 1999. Global Monthly Precipitation, 1900-1999 (Hulme). Data set. Available on-line [http://www.daac.ornl.gov] from Oak Ridge National Laboratory Distributed Active Archive Center, Oak Ridge, Tennessee, U.S.A. doi:10.3334/ORNLDAAC/417
